ygData.subject: Re: NightShade's Repair
ygData.msgSnippet: She looked at him. Sir, I had nothing to do with that. I was under a pile of rock. I will defend myself if I have to against your leader.

She looked at him. "Sir, I had nothing to do with that. I was under 
a pile of rock. I will defend myself if I have to against your 
leader."


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "airly2000" <airly2002@h...> wrote:
> Windlord::
> 
> "Agree, NightShade"said Windlord"I just have to told you 
something: 
> To get revange against our leader, Hydras ordered the kidnap of 
> Rodimus' wife and while we try to save her a fellow was killed... 
> Try to stay away, 'cause our Leader promised that all involde in 
> will be destroyed and I could say that all who attempt to protect 
> them too, so be awared "
> 
> And looking to Denzabar said "What do you wish to know about the 
> factions, my friend"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Gimliyotoden@a... wrote:
> > Denzabar gave a frim nod in agreement. He wondered to 
> himself "Hydras" Then
